    KOH TAO YOGA

    Yoga & Wellness Center in Koh Tao

    Stay Fit & Relaxed on your trip to Koh Tao. All yoga styles, Breathwork, Icebath, Soundhealing and much more. Take a breath and get moving to our Studio!

    Check schedule Get to the studio

    The best space for your Yoga & Wellness needs.

    Never too crowded. Always nearby. Over 8 different Yoga Styles.. Come and try! Check our climate controlled studio 50m from the pier with the best teachers in Koh Tao.

      More than 8 different Yoga Styles.
